content.question: In the first paragraph, the author uses the phrase “rented readers” in order to

choices.label: define writers’ workshops in terms of their value to aspiring writers
express sympathy for writers who have no one to read their work for free
contrast the academic goals of classes with the commercial aims of workshops
highlight the financial sacrifices that writers must make in order to succeed

content.answer: define writers’ workshops in terms of their value to aspiring writers

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
